section.title:
Programming tips for providing highly responsive and fast Android applications Android devices have less power than standard desktop or notebook computers. For this reason you must be careful with memory consumption.
Especially on Android devices before Android 5.0 you want to avoid triggering the garbage collector of the virtual machine as this results in a freeze of the Android runtime for about 200 ms and that can be a notable delay if the user is for example scrolling down a list.
